briefdescription.para: Archive the list item to a message.

parameterdescription.para: The message to archive the list item to.
If true also archive child views.

briefdescription.para: Hook method called when the item is drawn.

parameterdescription.para: The view that the list item is a child of.
Whether or not to draw the background in addition to the item's contents.

briefdescription.para: Create a new list item from archived message.

parameterdescription.para: The message to create the list item from.

briefdescription.para: Create a new list item with the specified level.

detaileddescription.para: The level and expanded arguments are only used if the item is added to a BOutlineListView.

parameterdescription.para: The level to create the list item on, default level is 0.
Whether or not the item is expanded.

briefdescription.para: Destroy the list item freeing any memory used.
Unselect the list item.
Return the height of the list item.

simplesect.para: The height of the list item as a float.

briefdescription.para: Returns whether or not the list item is currently enabled.

simplesect.para: true if the list item is enabled, false if it is disabled.

briefdescription.para: Returns whether or not the list item is currently expanded.

simplesect.para: true if the list item is expanded, false if it is not expanded.

briefdescription.para: Return whether or not the list item is currently selected.

simplesect.para: true if the list item is selected, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Returns the current outline level of the list item. This only makes sense if the list item is part of a BOutlineListView.

simplesect.para: The current outline level of the list item.

briefdescription.para: Performs an action give a perform_code and arg. (Internal Method)

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to some data to perform on.

briefdescription.para: Select the list item.
Enable or disable the list item.

parameterdescription.para: Set true to enable, false to disable the list item.

briefdescription.para: Set the expanded state of the list item. This only makes sense if the list item is part of a BOutlineListView.

parameterdescription.para: true to expand the list item, false to un-expand the list item.

briefdescription.para: Set the height of the list item to height.

parameterdescription.para: The height to set the list item to.

simplesect.para: Unlike BeOS, if you change the height then you need to force the BListView to recalculate the cached tops of the item selection boxes, otherwise selection highlights will be drawn in the wrong places and mouse clicks will be misinterpreted. You can do this by adding and removing a dummy BListItem at the top of the list, or after hrev50780 by calling BListView::FrameResized() with the current Frame rectangle (though the FrameResized() method will additionally call BListItem::Update() for all items).

briefdescription.para: Set the outline level of the list item.

parameterdescription.para: The outline level to set the list item to.

briefdescription.para: Set the width of the list item to width.

parameterdescription.para: The width to set the list item to.

briefdescription.para: Hook method that's called when the owner changes.

detaileddescription.para: This method gets called when the list item is added to the list view.
The default implementation sets the width of the list item to the width of owner and sets the height to fit font.

parameterdescription.para: The font set to the list item's current owner.

briefdescription.para: Return the width of the list item.

simplesect.para: The width of the list item as a float.

briefdescription.para: A list item, a member of a BListView or BOutlineListView.
